title: Problem with installation from source, src\cmd\8l\enam.c: error: missing terminating " character
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. hg pull -u
2. cd src
3. make.bat

What is the expected output?
Go compile properly

What do you see instead?
c:\Go\src>make.bat
# Building C bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist

lib9
libbio
libmach
misc/pprof
cmd/addr2line
cmd/nm
cmd/objdump
cmd/pack
cmd/prof
cmd/cc
cmd/gc
cmd/8l
c:\Go\src\cmd\8l\enam.c:516:2: error: missing terminating " character [-Werror]
c:\Go\src\cmd\8l\enam.c:516:2: error: missing terminating " character
c:\Go\src\cmd\8l\enam.c:517:1: error: missing terminating " character [-Werror]
c:\Go\src\cmd\8l\enam.c:517:1: error: missing terminating " character
cc1.exe: all warnings being treated as errors
go tool dist: FAILED: gcc -Wall -Wstrict-prototypes -Wextra -Wunused -Wuninitialized
-Wno-sign-compare -Wno-missing-braces -Wno-parentheses -Wno-unknown-pragmas -Wno-switch
-Wno-comment -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Werror -fno-common -ggdb -pipe -O2 -c -m32
-I c:\Go\include -I c:\Go\src\cmd\8l -o
C:\Users\Dobek\AppData\Local\Temp\go4921.tmp\enam.o c:\Go\src\cmd\8l\enam.c
# Building compilers and Go bootstrap tool.

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
8g

Which operating system are you using?
Windows 7 x32

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')
go version go1.1.2 windows/386

Please provide any additional information below.
Source of c:\Go\src\cmd\8l\enam.c:
http://pastebin.com/T7R42vyA

Best regards,
Dobrosław Żybort
